documents.content: Aetna claim form #CHI-2209-5893 details ER visit for patient Kieran Voss (DOB 03/15/2012) at UnityPoint Health-Cedar Rapids following seizure episode. Preauthorization granted for 72-hour EEG monitoring. Service code G40.812 confirmed for Lennox-Gastaut syndrome complications.

Neurology consult report from UI Stead Family Children's Hospital indicates Kieran Voss (MRN 44578Y) showed positive response to fenfluramine add-on therapy. New prior authorization required for off-label protocol. Care team includes Dr. Elise Warren (epileptology) and Dr. Raj Mehta (genetics).

Cigna policy memo ID 4892-LGS outlines new pediatric seizure disorder coverage exceptions effective Q2 2023. Requires genetic confirmation and failed trials of 4+ anticonvulsants. Cedar Rapids region showing 12 active cases meeting criteria - including patient #44578Y.

Midwest Pediatric Epilepsy Consortium study #MPEC-23-108 tracks 8 patients on combined cannabidiol/fenfluramine regimen. Participant KV (age 12) achieved 58% seizure reduction. Next monitoring appointment scheduled 09/30/2023 at UIHC's Level 4 Epilepsy Center.

metadata.content_summary: Pediatric epilepsy patient journey involving rare disease treatment, insurance policy updates, and clinical research participation across multiple care settings

questions.q: Which two specialists are managing treatment for Kieran Voss (patient #44578Y) with Lennox-Gastaut syndrome?
questions.a: Dr. Elise Warren (epileptology) and Dr. Raj Mehta (genetics)

questions.q: What new requirements did Cigna policy 4892-LGS introduce for pediatric seizure disorder coverage in Q2 2023?
questions.a: Genetic confirmation and failed trials of 4+ anticonvulsants

questions.q: What treatment combination showed 58% seizure reduction for participant KV in the MPEC study at UIHC's epilepsy center?
What evidence demonstrates the multi-faceted care approach for Lennox-Gastaut patients in Cedar Rapids?
questions.a: ER visits, specialized monitoring, off-label therapies, and clinical trial participation
